QuestData.Title: Betrayal
QuestData.Description: The time has come to end this charade, $n.$b$bAs valuable as your information has been, we must bring Drakuru down and bring his project to an end before his freaks are unleashed.$b$bWe've modified your scepter for the job. When the time is right, you will be able to use it on Drakuru's Blightbloods and turn them against him. It's your only hope of defeating him.$b$bFight well.
QuestData.LogDescription: Stefan in Ebon Watch wants you to defeat Drakuru.$b$bIf you lose your Ensorcelled Choker, return to Stefan at Ebon Watch to get another.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you faced Drakuru in battle, $n?
QuestData.RewardText: So, it is done.$b$bWe still have much to do, but our work here will be much more manageable thanks to your efforts.$b$bPlease accept this as a token of our gratitude.
